title: Add get_lr in ReduceLROnPlateau
body_html:
With Learning-Rate Scheduler a nice enhancement came with the update, beside more others.

But why does the ReduceLROnPlateau not have a get_lr method, for consistency it should have one? Because every other Scheduler have one and omit a verbose-mode.

body:
With Learning-Rate Scheduler a nice enhancement came with the update, beside more others.

But why does the ReduceLROnPlateau not have a **get_lr method**, for consistency it should have one? Because every other Scheduler have one and omit a **verbose-mode**.
